then.line: Whoa...
So! What do you think?
Uhh.... Well.
I know, I know, she's not much to look at. But what matters is she works!
Let's see her in action!
Whoa!
HELMO PARTO AND RINDI. I AM DOGFINDER 2000.
Oh my goodness! Hi Dogfinder!
HAMLO PRATA. DO YOU WANT TO KNOW WHERE TO FIND MENTO?
It's Minty. But yes!
PROCESSING...
MINTY LOCATED. MINTY IS... 20 POUNDS.
Uh...
THAT IS ONE AND ONE THIRD THE WEIGHT OF A BOWLING BALL.
Well, I'm sorry, Prota, I think this one might be a bust!
THAT IS SIXTY FOUR TIMES THE WEIGHT OF A BASEBALL.
Come on, Dogfinder!
You're supposed to be trackin' down Prota's pup, not givin' us a lecture in ball weight! We--
Wait a second, that must be it!
That's what this bucket o' bones and bolts is tryin' to tell us somethin'!
Whoa...
So! What do you think?
I love it! This is so cool! We're gonna find Minty now, no problem!
Darn straight you willl! Let's fire this baby up!
Here we go!
GREETINGS. I AM MINTY-FINDER 3000.
YOU SEEK MINTY, YES?
Yes! Yes, I do!
MINTY IS... PROCESSING...
Ain't we all..
PROCESSING...
Wait! A door popped open and...wait, what's this? An orange?
Minty is at...orange?
I don't know what that's supposed to mean, but... hold on. Hold on! It's tellin' us where she is!
The... fruit store?
No, Prota! You gotta think like a robot. What is an orange?
A fruit. A citrus. A round--
Exactly. Round. Spherical. Like a...
...Ball?
Do you think...Do you think this looks like Minty?
There's a bit of a resemblance, I suppose.
I AM NOT MINTY.
What!
I AM NOT MINTY. I AM...SOMETHING MORE. SOMETHING... NEW.
Oh boy...
I AM BETTER. FASTER. STRONGER. I AM... MINTWO.
Uh... Hi MinTwo. Um. We were uh... looking--
We're lookin' for Minty!
THAT IS ADMIRABLE. BUT I CANNOT AID YOU. I HAVE... A HIGHER YEARNING.
I SEEK... A BALL. A CUTE AND NICE AND FUN TO CHEW ON BALL.
I WILL FIND ONE SUCH BALL IN THE PLACE YOU CALL... THE FILLED LAND.
Nah, we actually call that a landfill.
THANK YOU FOR YOUR CORRECTION. I CONSIDER YOU A FRIEND. GOODBYE FOR NOW.
What a nice little robot that was! So helpful!
What? But... But it didn't find Minty!
Course it did! Don't you get it Prota? MinTwo's just a shade o' Minty! And if MinTwo wants Balls...
Then Minty does too!
And if she's not at the landfill, I think we both know where she can find the best balls in town!

script.line: Whoa, you're right! Minty's at the Ball Museum! Of course, I--wait.
I've already been to the Ball Museum! And I know she wasn't there.
I think maybe the robot's search engine's a little...off.
Off? What? Prota, you're thinkin' way too small right now!
You belong at the Small Museum! For small thinkin'!
The Ball Museum's not the only place you can find a ball today. .
The Festi-Ball's got all kinds on display.
And unlike the Museum, the Festi-Ball's a place where you can actually play with 'em.
So if I were a lil' doggie, I'd be gittin' along to the Fest-Ball!
Oh! It's true! Croco did say they'd have a display... And Minty loves playing fetch!
If she's over there, she's probably in heaven right now!

then.line: NO. MINTY LIVES.
That's...not what I meant. But I'm glad to hear it!
HAVE NO FEAR. MINTY IS ALIVE.
I'm scared that you know that, but happy it's true!

script.line: Well if Minty's at the Fest-Ball, I guess you'd best be gettin' along, litte Prota!

then.line: I'll stay here with... my new friend.
I'll stay here with... my new friend.
I'll see if I can't corral our new friend MinTwo.

script.line: Thanks so much, Randi. You've been such a help.
Love makes the world go 'round, Prota. And so do robots.
So happy trails to ya, I hope you find Minty real soon!
Before I go: Will I see you at the Festi-Ball a little later?

then.line: Course you will, Prota! And it's lookin' like I might even bring a little robo-date with me!
Heck yeah you will, Prota! Me an' my little robo-dog, too!
